Indicator: Economic Inequality
IndicatorLabelTable: Economic Inequality

For example, the Indicator looks at structural inequality that is based on group (such as racial, ethnic, religious, or other identity group) or based on education, economic status, or region (such as urban-rural divide). It also takes into account perceived inequalities that can cause grievences among vulnerable populations.
